name: Bendono
description:
bendono is a survival horror game wrapped around 2d platformer core.  now the game is in alpha version and need support.  the current version doesn't have story.

controls

  1. W/S/A/D navigation
  2. R reload
  3. SPACE interact
  4. MOUSE aim and shoot
  5. exit user ALT + f4 

bendono (bendana) is javanese language from bendo (benda) which means "thing" or an object. bendono means object or things that stuck or held permanently or hard to remove or to change, like human ego, tendency to seek for ones comfort, richness or instinct, inner brutality.

things that i promise in the finished product :

  1. sound effect and songs
  2. a lot of puzzle solving
  3. more guns
  4. more zombie
  5. more enemy type
  6. more levels
  7. cut scenes ( story )
